feed.title: Docmost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • client: fix APP_URL usage by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/31

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add full page width preference by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/44
  • added fuzzy matching logic for menu search by @SurajJadhav7 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/34
  • fix media visibility in Firefox by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/45

New Contributors

  • @SurajJadhav7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/34

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: missing tree, editor font and responsive recent pages by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/55
  • make page attachments private by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/51

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.2...0.2.3

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add health check by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/64
  • CORS setup and Vite devServer proxy by @will2hew in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/57
  • Add support for AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variables by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/71
  • make emails case-insensitive by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/73
  • remove redundant page slug_id index by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/74

New Contributors

  • @will2hew made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/57

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/0.2.3...v0.2.4
